Class CompanyRep

java.lang.Object
CompanyRep
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUser, Serializable
public class CompanyRep extends Object implements IUser
Represents a company representative user in the internship portal. A company representative can create and manage internships, accept or reject student applications and toggle visibility of their approved internships.
See Also:

    • CompanyRep

      public CompanyRep(String id, String companyName, String department, String position, CompanyRepStatus repStatus, String passwordHash)
      Creates a new company representative with the given details.
      Parameters:
      id - company rep ID (email)
      companyName - company name
      department - department
      position - position/title
      repStatus - (PENDING/APROVED/REJECTED)

    • setPassword

      public void setPassword(String newPassword)

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      newPassword - the new password value

    • addInternship

      public boolean addInternship(Internship internship)
      Adds an internship created by this company representative to the database. This is only allowed if the representative is APPROVED, the internship belongs to this representative and the representative has fewer than 5 internships.
      Parameters:
      internship - the internship to add
      Returns:
      true if the internship was added successfully, false otherwise

    • getInternship

      public Internship getInternship(String title)
      Finds an internship created by this representative by its title. The search is case-insensitive and only internships owned by this representative are considered.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the internship to search for
      Returns:
      the matching internship, or null if not found

    • acceptStudentInternship

      public boolean acceptStudentInternship(Student student, Internship internship, int decisionStatus)
      Accepts or rejects a student's internship application for an internship owned by this representative. The internship must be approved and belong to this representative.
      Parameters:
      student - the student whose application is being decided on
      internship - the internship in question
      decisionStatus - 1 for successful, 2 for unsuccessful, any other value is invalid
      Returns:
      true if the application status was updated, false otherwise

    • toggleVisibility

      public boolean toggleVisibility(Internship internship)
      Toggles the visibility of an approved internship owned by this representative. Only approved internships belonging to this representative can have their visibility changed.
      Parameters:
      internship - the internship whose visibility is to be toggled
      Returns:
      true if the visibility was toggled, false otherwise
